entry.tran: （尤指涉及毒品交易的）牙买加犯罪集团成员
entry.def: A Yardie is a member of a secret criminal organization, based in Jamaica, which is especially associated with drug dealing.

means.word_mean: 1. member of an international gang of Jamaican criminals who sell drugs and violence;

sentences.sentence: "A much publicized raid on a yardie stronghold had first been simulated at Riot City"
